original_text: Now to him who is able to strengthen you according to my gospel and the preaching of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery that was kept secret for long ages
korean_text: 나의 복음과 예수 그리스도를 전파함은 영세 전부터 감추어졌다가

sentences.original_text: Now to him who is able to strengthen you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희를 능히 강건하게 하실 수 있는 그분께

sentences.original_text: and the preaching of Jesus Christ
according to the revelation of the mystery
that was kept secret for long ages
sentences.korean_translation: 오랜 세월 동안 비밀로 지켜졌던 것
